and b.admin_id = #{adminId}
and b.type = #{type}
and a.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
and b.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and a.card_no like concat('%',#{cardNo},'%')
and s.name like concat('%',#{storeName},'%')
order by a.user_id DESC ,a.created DESC
